item.title: setting up a blog in 2022
item.description: the state of blogging software in 2022 is quite depressing in general. it feels like not a lot has moved in the last couple of years, yet none of the existing solutions are really satisfying. you mainly have the choice between two paths you can take: the full-blown-wysiwyg-self-integrated-platform or the minimalist-markdown-to-html-tool. i’ve tried my hand at both for some time, so here’s my notes. wysiwyg hosted solutions there are a bunch of platforms like medium, but i greatly dislike the idea of companies making money with my content, so that wasn’t an option.
